#!/bin/bash

# Run ruff format (outputs to stdout by default)
ruff format

# Run ruff check with fix, print to stdout and save to out.txt
ruff check --fix | tee out.txt

# Get modified files (staged or unstaged)
modified=$(git status --porcelain | grep '^ M' | cut -c4-)

# Get untracked (new) files
untracked=$(git status --porcelain | grep '^??' | cut -c4-)

# Commit new files individually
for file in $untracked; do
  if [ "$file" != "admin.sh" ] && [ "$file" != "out.txt" ]; then
    git add "$file"
    git commit "$file" -m "Add new file $file"
  fi
done

# Commit modified files individually
for file in $modified; do
  if [ "$file" != "admin.sh" ] && [ "$file" != "out.txt" ]; then
    git commit "$file" -m "Update $file"
  fi
done

# Run pytest, print to stdout and append to out.txt
uv run pytest -v | tee -a out.txt
